page.title: 08LOCAL NEWS IN WITHYHAM ST/J
page.content: On 1st October 1985 the lovely {landscape}of our area was spoilt by an unusual event. It was the hottest October day on record, the{temperature reached into the eighties and improvement work on the local{sewage plant was in progress. A combination of the heat and sewage made a very unpleasant smell in the neighbourhood which did not go unnoticed by the {local}people. They were, though, I am sure, prepared to put up with this, because I am sure it is a great improvement on 9oo years ago. I have just moved to Crowborough and live on the north side pf the town so it is interesting for me to go into our area on the map.
